title: Word
description: A structured representation of a japanese word and its meanings for creating Anki flashcards.

id.description: A unique identifier for the word.

kanji.description: The kanji representation of the word.

generateCards.description: Indicates if the word should generate cards.

japaneseToEnglish.description: Indicates if the word should generate cards from Japanese to English.

englishToJapanese.description: Indicates if the word should generate cards from English to Japanese.
